/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with an array of buildings and shops, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of gray and brown dominating the palette, reflecting the urban environment and the weather conditions.
